page.title: 05FORESTRY continued
page.content: Two wild forest sows are presently being kept in a controlled area,to help break up the ground naturally and hence speed up the regeneration process.Intensive forestry comprises 1165 acres of young plantation.Some of the felled pine,spruce and fir are transported to the paper mill at Fort William,some are used in this country for furniture and house building and a supply is exported to Sweden.{ {4)RECREATION }Rothiemurchus is a popular place with visitors to the countryside.The visitors service provides facilities and activities such as picnic areas,fishing,walks and estate farm tours for 15000 tourists per year.{Labour }18 workers are employed on the estate;half on farming and half on tourism(including 2 countryside rangers and 4 shop staff).
